title: Don't Miss Big Savings on Cyber Monday Laptop Deals – Including Up to $250 Off MacBooks
description: If you're on the hunt for a new laptop, these offers from Apple, Microsoft, Dell and others can help you save hundreds.
author: Russell Holly
excerpt: If you're on the hunt for a new laptop, these offers from Apple, Microsoft, Dell and others can help you save hundreds.
text: With the holiday season also (thankfully) comes a lot of sales. Right now, we've reached Cyber Monday, when many of the deals from Black Friday continue and even more new ones emerge. If you're in the market for a high-quality laptop that won't break the bank, now's the perfect time to strike. Several top brands, including Apple, Dell and Lenovo, are offering big discounts on their latest models. Whether you are after a MacBook for work or a gaming laptop with all the bells and whistles, there's a deal waiting for you. Our team of CNET experts has tested all the computers we could get our hands on to help you decide on the best laptop to buy. We've combed through the bulk of laptop deals to present the top options available from reputable retailers like Amazon, Walmart and Best Buy.  Check back on this page as we continue adding deals we find on Cyber Monday and beyond. If you're seeking computing power that is even more mobile, head over to our roundups of the best Cyber Monday phone and tablet deals so you don't miss out. Best Cyber Monday laptop deals Apple/CNET The latest model in Apple's lightweight lineup, the M3 MacBook Air sits at the top of our list for the best laptop of 2024. This model features a 13.6-inch Liquid Retina display, an 18-hour battery life, 8GB of RAM and 256GB of storage. It's also designed to work with Apple Intelligence. All colors and configurations are currently $200 off at Best Buy. Lenovo/CNET Featuring a 14-inch, 1,920x1,200-pixel touchscreen, the Lenovo Yoga 7 is the best two-in-one laptop of 2024. This discounted configuration boasts some powerful hardware, including 16GB of RAM, a 1TB SSD, an AMD Radeon 780M GPU and an AMD Ryzen 7 processor. It also comes with the Lenovo Digital Pen stylus. Alienware/CNET This Alienware model is already one of our favorite gaming laptops for folks on a budget, and right now you can pick it up for even less. There are a few different configurations on sale, but this $1,300 model is equipped with an Intel Core Ultra 9 processor, an Nvidia GeForce RTX 4060 GPU, 16GB of RAM and 1TB of storage. This laptop can handle almost anything you need without weighing down your backpack or your lap. It has a 16-inch touchscreen display, an Intel Core i7 processor, 32GB of RAM and a hefty 1TB of storage. This 2024 laptop has a touchscreen display, 16GB of RAM and 512GB of SSD storage. It also has the Snapdragon X Elite processor, AI capabilities through Copilot Plus and gets up to 20 hours of battery life. Best Cyber Monday MacBook deals CNET/Apple A large screen and powerful hardware make this one of the best laptops for creatives. It's packing some decent specs as well with 18GB of RAM and a lovely 16-inch screen. An excellent choice for Apple fans or fans-to-be. Apple MacBook Air M1 (13-inch): $599 (save $100). This previous-gen MacBook Air is our top pick for Apple users on a budget.Apple MacBook Air M2 (13-inch): $799 (save $200). This model is newer than the M1 and comes with 16GB of RAM, making it more future-proof.Apple MacBook Air M3 (15-inch): $1,099 (save $200). If you need a large yet portable laptop, look no further. This model comes with all the benefits of the MacBook Air form factor but with a larger display.Apple MacBook Pro M4 (14-inch): $1,399 (save $200). Score savings on a cutting-edge Apple laptop that just hit shelves this month.Apple MacBook Pro M4 (16-inch): $2,249 (save $250). Get the biggest current-gen Apple laptop and save $300 on the base M4 Pro model. Other configurations are discounted by up to $400. Best Cyber Monday Chromebook deals CNET/Lenovo This popular and affordable Lenovo two-in-one is one of the best Chromebooks of 2024. It has a compact 11-inch screen, making it really easy to carry around all day, and it still squeezes in 4GB of memory too. Lenovo Duet 11 Chromebook: $249 (Save $130). Replacing the outgoing Duet 3, the Duet 11 is more powerful and sports a kickstand that's better for vertical viewing (and reading comic books).Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3 Chromebook: $169 (Save $150). It'll get updates until June 2033, has a 14-inch touchscreen, and will be perfect for your kid's homework or Grandma's stress-free browsing.Acer Chromebook Plus 514: $279 (save $110). Our overall top pick for the best Chromebook on the market.HP 14-inch Chromebook Laptop: $129 (save $170). Both fast and with a long battery life, this Chromebook won't let you down for those looking to complete simple tasks.Best Cyber Monday gaming laptop deals CNET/ASUS This 16-inch gaming laptop has 16GB of RAM and a GeForce RTX 4060 along with a 1TB SSD. It's not top-end, but it's a very solid choice for pretty much everyone who wants to game on the go and still enjoy solid specs. Lenovo LOQ 15.6" FHD 144Hz gaming laptop: $600 (save $600). Get half off this laptop now at Walmart.Acer Nitro RTX 3050 Ti gaming laptop: $799 (save $101). This affordable gaming laptop combines a 13th-generation Intel Core i5 processor with an Nvidia GeForce RTX 4050 graphics card. This deal is so good that it's now back-ordered, so it might not arrive in time for Christmas.Asus TUF A15 gaming laptop: $800 (save $200). The Asus TUF's processing speed and graphics quality exceed all expectations, allowing it to handle even the most demanding games.MSI Cyborg: $750 (save $350). This 14-inch laptop is easy to carry around and still packs in an RTX 4060 for solid graphics.Lenovo Legion 7i: $1,500 (save $500). This beast has a 16-inch screen, a 1TB SSD and an RTX 4070.Asus Rog Zephyrus G14: $1,200 (save $400). The 3K visuals on this 14-inch screen look incredible, and it's highly portable.Alienware m16: $1,600 (save $500) . If you want a lot of power, then this 16-inch Alienware model has it, thanks to 32GB of RAM and an RTX 4070. Best Cyber Monday laptop deals for students Acer/CNET This budget-friendly Acer is the best cheap laptop of 2024. With an AMD Ryzen 3 processor, 8GB of RAM and 128GB of storage, it's designed for the basics like scrolling social media and checking your email. It also has a built-in webcam, and an HDMI port and weighs just 3.2 pounds so it's easy to take on the go. Lenovo Essential: $500 (save $300). Add the on-page coupon to save an extra $50 on this touchscreen laptop.Samsung Galaxy Book 4: $530 (save $370). A solid middle-of-the-road option for those who just need the basics.Dell Inspiron 14 Plus: $850 (save $150). A top pick of 2024, thanks to its impressive all-day battery life.Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 11: $1,589 (save $1,300). This 14-inch Lenovo is our favorite business laptop of 2024.Nimo 15.6-inch laptop: $300 (save $200). This is marketed to students but it's also perfect for anyone looking for a budget-friendly laptop with solid specs. It has 16GB RAM, 1TB of storage, a fingerprint reader and a 2-year warranty. It's also 40% off.Microsoft Surface Laptop 7: $899 (save $301). Powerful hardware and a lightweight design earned this Microsoft model a spot on our list of the best laptops of 2024. What should you look for in a Cyber Monday laptop deal? One of the biggest considerations is which laptop configuration is on sale. With the best laptop deals, typically only a specific version of the laptop is discounted, and making any changes to the hardware, specs or even color could affect the price. This means that sometimes you find that, for example, a model with 512GB of storage is actually cheaper than the 256GB option. Be careful when you're adjusting specs, and look out for sudden price changes. Ultimately, you're looking for the biggest savings compared with not only the price but the usual "street" price for a laptop. Don't be fooled by list prices. Use price comparison sites or shopping extensions to make sure the discounted price is actually a good deal.  Which retailers usually offer the best Cyber Monday laptop deals? You can usually find laptop deals at a variety of retailers. Major retailers like Best Buy and Amazon, plus smaller competitors like Newegg, Adorama and B&H Photo, tend to offer sales on more specific models, while manufacturers such as HP, Lenovo and Dell usually host larger sales that cover more models and configurations. If you're looking for a specific model, you'll want to keep checking back throughout the holiday shopping season for the latest batch of deals. Will laptops be cheaper on Cyber Monday? Usually, there are no significant differences between the Black Friday and Cyber Monday discounts. Big hitters like Best Buy and Amazon tend to bring out the big discounts directly on Black Friday. You might be able to find some additional savings on items that haven't run out just yet. If there's something that catches your eye, we'd recommend jumping on it immediately. Most of these discounts end as soon as the product is out of stock.
html:
With the holiday season also (thankfully) comes a lot of sales. Right now, we've reached Cyber Monday, when many of the deals from Black Friday continue and even more new ones emerge. If you're in the market for a high-quality laptop that won't break the bank, now's the perfect time to strike. Several top brands, including Apple, Dell and Lenovo, are offering big discounts on their latest models. Whether you are after a MacBook for work or a gaming laptop with all the bells and whistles, there's a deal waiting for you.

Our team of CNET experts has tested all the computers we could get our hands on to help you decide on the best laptop to buy. We've combed through the bulk of laptop deals to present the top options available from reputable retailers like Amazon, Walmart and Best Buy. 

Check back on this page as we continue adding deals we find on Cyber Monday and beyond. If you're seeking computing power that is even more mobile, head over to our roundups of the best Cyber Monday phone and tablet deals so you don't miss out.

Best Cyber Monday laptop deals

The latest model in Apple's lightweight lineup, the M3 MacBook Air sits at the top of our list for the best laptop of 2024. This model features a 13.6-inch Liquid Retina display, an 18-hour battery life, 8GB of RAM and 256GB of storage. It's also designed to work with Apple Intelligence. All colors and configurations are currently $200 off at Best Buy.

Featuring a 14-inch, 1,920x1,200-pixel touchscreen, the Lenovo Yoga 7 is the best two-in-one laptop of 2024. This discounted configuration boasts some powerful hardware, including 16GB of RAM, a 1TB SSD, an AMD Radeon 780M GPU and an AMD Ryzen 7 processor. It also comes with the Lenovo Digital Pen stylus.

This Alienware model is already one of our favorite gaming laptops for folks on a budget, and right now you can pick it up for even less. There are a few different configurations on sale, but this $1,300 model is equipped with an Intel Core Ultra 9 processor, an Nvidia GeForce RTX 4060 GPU, 16GB of RAM and 1TB of storage.

This laptop can handle almost anything you need without weighing down your backpack or your lap. It has a 16-inch touchscreen display, an Intel Core i7 processor, 32GB of RAM and a hefty 1TB of storage.

This 2024 laptop has a touchscreen display, 16GB of RAM and 512GB of SSD storage. It also has the Snapdragon X Elite processor, AI capabilities through Copilot Plus and gets up to 20 hours of battery life.

Best Cyber Monday MacBook deals

A large screen and powerful hardware make this one of the best laptops for creatives. It's packing some decent specs as well with 18GB of RAM and a lovely 16-inch screen. An excellent choice for Apple fans or fans-to-be.

  • Apple MacBook Air M1 (13-inch): $599 (save $100). This previous-gen MacBook Air is our top pick for Apple users on a budget.
  • Apple MacBook Air M2 (13-inch): $799 (save $200). This model is newer than the M1 and comes with 16GB of RAM, making it more future-proof.
  • Apple MacBook Air M3 (15-inch): $1,099 (save $200). If you need a large yet portable laptop, look no further. This model comes with all the benefits of the MacBook Air form factor but with a larger display.
  • Apple MacBook Pro M4 (14-inch): $1,399 (save $200). Score savings on a cutting-edge Apple laptop that just hit shelves this month.
  • Apple MacBook Pro M4 (16-inch): $2,249 (save $250). Get the biggest current-gen Apple laptop and save $300 on the base M4 Pro model. Other configurations are discounted by up to $400.

Best Cyber Monday Chromebook deals

This popular and affordable Lenovo two-in-one is one of the best Chromebooks of 2024. It has a compact 11-inch screen, making it really easy to carry around all day, and it still squeezes in 4GB of memory too.

  • Lenovo Duet 11 Chromebook: $249 (Save $130). Replacing the outgoing Duet 3, the Duet 11 is more powerful and sports a kickstand that's better for vertical viewing (and reading comic books).
  • Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3 Chromebook: $169 (Save $150). It'll get updates until June 2033, has a 14-inch touchscreen, and will be perfect for your kid's homework or Grandma's stress-free browsing.
  • Acer Chromebook Plus 514: $279 (save $110). Our overall top pick for the best Chromebook on the market.
  • HP 14-inch Chromebook Laptop: $129 (save $170). Both fast and with a long battery life, this Chromebook won't let you down for those looking to complete simple tasks.

Best Cyber Monday gaming laptop deals

This 16-inch gaming laptop has 16GB of RAM and a GeForce RTX 4060 along with a 1TB SSD. It's not top-end, but it's a very solid choice for pretty much everyone who wants to game on the go and still enjoy solid specs.

  • Lenovo LOQ 15.6" FHD 144Hz gaming laptop: $600 (save $600). Get half off this laptop now at Walmart.
  • Acer Nitro RTX 3050 Ti gaming laptop: $799 (save $101). This affordable gaming laptop combines a 13th-generation Intel Core i5 processor with an Nvidia GeForce RTX 4050 graphics card. This deal is so good that it's now back-ordered, so it might not arrive in time for Christmas.
  • Asus TUF A15 gaming laptop: $800 (save $200). The Asus TUF's processing speed and graphics quality exceed all expectations, allowing it to handle even the most demanding games.
  • MSI Cyborg: $750 (save $350). This 14-inch laptop is easy to carry around and still packs in an RTX 4060 for solid graphics.
  • Lenovo Legion 7i: $1,500 (save $500). This beast has a 16-inch screen, a 1TB SSD and an RTX 4070.
  • Asus Rog Zephyrus G14: $1,200 (save $400). The 3K visuals on this 14-inch screen look incredible, and it's highly portable.
  • Alienware m16: $1,600 (save $500) . If you want a lot of power, then this 16-inch Alienware model has it, thanks to 32GB of RAM and an RTX 4070.

Best Cyber Monday laptop deals for students

This budget-friendly Acer is the best cheap laptop of 2024. With an AMD Ryzen 3 processor, 8GB of RAM and 128GB of storage, it's designed for the basics like scrolling social media and checking your email. It also has a built-in webcam, and an HDMI port and weighs just 3.2 pounds so it's easy to take on the go.

  • Lenovo Essential: $500 (save $300). Add the on-page coupon to save an extra $50 on this touchscreen laptop.
  • Samsung Galaxy Book 4: $530 (save $370). A solid middle-of-the-road option for those who just need the basics.
  • Dell Inspiron 14 Plus: $850 (save $150). A top pick of 2024, thanks to its impressive all-day battery life.
  • Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 11: $1,589 (save $1,300). This 14-inch Lenovo is our favorite business laptop of 2024.
  • Nimo 15.6-inch laptop: $300 (save $200). This is marketed to students but it's also perfect for anyone looking for a budget-friendly laptop with solid specs. It has 16GB RAM, 1TB of storage, a fingerprint reader and a 2-year warranty. It's also 40% off.
  • Microsoft Surface Laptop 7: $899 (save $301). Powerful hardware and a lightweight design earned this Microsoft model a spot on our list of the best laptops of 2024.

What should you look for in a Cyber Monday laptop deal?

One of the biggest considerations is which laptop configuration is on sale. With the best laptop deals, typically only a specific version of the laptop is discounted, and making any changes to the hardware, specs or even color could affect the price. This means that sometimes you find that, for example, a model with 512GB of storage is actually cheaper than the 256GB option. Be careful when you're adjusting specs, and look out for sudden price changes. Ultimately, you're looking for the biggest savings compared with not only the price but the usual "street" price for a laptop. Don't be fooled by list prices. Use price comparison sites or shopping extensions to make sure the discounted price is actually a good deal. 

Which retailers usually offer the best Cyber Monday laptop deals?

You can usually find laptop deals at a variety of retailers. Major retailers like Best Buy and Amazon, plus smaller competitors like Newegg, Adorama and B&H Photo, tend to offer sales on more specific models, while manufacturers such as HP, Lenovo and Dell usually host larger sales that cover more models and configurations. If you're looking for a specific model, you'll want to keep checking back throughout the holiday shopping season for the latest batch of deals.

Will laptops be cheaper on Cyber Monday?

Usually, there are no significant differences between the Black Friday and Cyber Monday discounts. Big hitters like Best Buy and Amazon tend to bring out the big discounts directly on Black Friday. You might be able to find some additional savings on items that haven't run out just yet. If there's something that catches your eye, we'd recommend jumping on it immediately. Most of these discounts end as soon as the product is out of stock.
